attributes.action: David Beckham and Olympic football squad
attributes.additional_details:
Call for Hugh Robertson ,Minister with special responsibility for Olympics 2012,to remove Stuart Pearce as selector of GB football team, in the light of his poor judgement in including players with criminal convictions and those who have misused injunctions to cover up unsavoury personal lives,whilst excluding GB's premier ambassador for football over many years.i.e;
David Beckham.Mr. Beckham is  generally well loved by the British population and has given fastidious and enduring support for football and the national team.
